trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"></xref> field that enables users to select a page by page number.
trans-unit.target: 代表<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"></xref>欄位，可讓使用者選取 頁面的頁碼。

trans-unit.source: The NumericPagerField class displays navigation controls in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control.
trans-unit.target: NumericPagerField 類別會顯示在導覽控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>

trans-unit.source: The controls can be used to page through data that is displayed by a control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer> interface, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用的控制項來逐頁查看資料所實作的控制項顯示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer>介面，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer>

trans-unit.source: The NumericPagerField object displays page numbers as buttons that users can click to move to specific a page.
trans-unit.target: NumericPagerField 物件顯示為按鈕讓使用者可以按一下以移至特定頁面的頁碼。

trans-unit.source: The control also displays next-page and previous-page buttons that enable users to access more pages of data than the ones that are displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項也會顯示下一頁和上一頁按鈕，可讓使用者能夠存取與控制項所顯示的資料頁。

trans-unit.source: You can customize the appearance of the NumericPagerField object by using the properties that are listed in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用下表中列出的屬性自訂 NumericPagerField 物件的外觀。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.CurrentPageLabelCssClass%2A>|The CSS class for the current page number.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.NextPreviousButtonCssClass%2A>|The CSS class for the next-page and previous-page buttons.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.NumericButtonCssClass%2A>|The CSS class for the buttons that represent the page numbers.| You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property to select the type of button that will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |描述 | |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.CurrentPageLabelCssClass%2A>|目前的頁碼的 CSS 類別。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.NextPreviousButtonCssClass%2A>|下一頁和上一頁按鈕的 CSS 類別。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.NumericButtonCssClass%2A>|表示頁碼的按鈕的 CSS 類別。 | 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.ButtonType%2A>屬性，以選取所要顯示的按鈕的類型。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.ButtonType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.NumericButtonCssClass%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.NextPreviousButtonCssClass%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.CurrentPageLabelCssClass%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available button types.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用的按鈕類型。

trans-unit.source: |Button type|Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName>|An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control.| The controls inside the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.NumericButtonCssClass%2A> object are rendered with non-breaking spaces between them.
trans-unit.target: |按鈕類型 |描述 | |-----------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控制項。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控制項。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控制項。 | 中的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.NumericButtonCssClass%2A>它們之間的不分行空格，以呈現物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.NumericButtonCssClass%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you want to customize this behavior, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.RenderNonBreakingSpacesBetweenControls%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要自訂此行為，您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.RenderNonBreakingSpacesBetweenControls%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.RenderNonBreakingSpacesBetweenControls%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can hide a NumericPagerField object in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.Visible%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以隱藏在 NumericPagerField 物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>藉由設定控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.Visible%2A>屬性`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>

trans-unit.source: You cannot control the visibility of the next-page and previous-page buttons.
trans-unit.target: 您無法控制下一頁和上一頁按鈕的可見性。

trans-unit.source: They are displayed by the control if the associated data control has additional pages available to display.
trans-unit.target: 如果相關聯的資料控制項的其他頁面可用來顯示，它們會顯示控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.ButtonCount%2A> property to specify how many buttons are displayed in a NumericPagerField object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.ButtonCount%2A>屬性來指定多少按鈕會顯示在 NumericPagerField 物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.ButtonCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each button corresponds to a page number.
trans-unit.target: 每個按鈕對應至頁碼。

trans-unit.source: You can set the text of the next-page button by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.NextPageText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定 [下一頁] 按鈕的文字，藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.NextPageText%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.NextPageText%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set the text of the previous-page button by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.PreviousPageText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以透過設定前一頁按鈕的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.PreviousPageText%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.PreviousPageText%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName>, you must provide the URL of an image that will be displayed for the next-page and previous page buttons.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.ButtonType%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName>，您必須提供下一頁和上一頁按鈕，將會顯示影像的 URL。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: You do this by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.NextPageImageUrl%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.PreviousPageImageUrl%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.NextPageImageUrl%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.PreviousPageImageUrl%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.PreviousPageImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.NextPageImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: In that case, the corresponding text property is used as the alternate text for the image.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，對應的文字屬性作為映像的替代文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, the text that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.NextPageImageUrl%2A> property is displayed as the alternate text for the next-page image button.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，由所指定的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.NextPageImageUrl%2A>屬性會顯示為下一個頁面影像按鈕的替代文字。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.NextPageImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: On browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip for the corresponding button.
trans-unit.target: 在瀏覽器支援工具提示，也會顯示此文字對應按鈕的工具提示的方式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is typically used when you add fields to a dynamically created <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式通常是當您將欄位加入至動態建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>

trans-unit.source: To add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField> object dynamically to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control, create a new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField> object, set its properties, and then add it to the field collection for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField>以動態方式為物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>控制，建立新<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField>物件、 設定其屬性，並將其加入的欄位集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of buttons to display in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要顯示的按鈕數目<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the ButtonCount property to specify the number of buttons to display in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ButtonCount 屬性來指定要顯示的按鈕數目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField>

trans-unit.source: Each button corresponds to a page number.
trans-unit.target: 每個按鈕對應至頁碼。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField> object has more pages than the number specified for ButtonCount, the control displays a next-page button that lets users access the next set of pages.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField>物件有更多的頁面編號 ButtonCount 為指定的數字，控制項會顯示讓使用者存取下一組頁面的下一頁按鈕。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField> object displays buttons only for existing page numbers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField>物件顯示按鈕，僅針對現有的頁碼。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField> object has fewer pages to show than the number specified for ButtonCount, the control shows fewer buttons than the number specified by this property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField>物件具有比 ButtonCount 針對指定的數字顯示的頁面也變少，控制項會顯示較少按鈕比這個屬性所指定的數字。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField>

trans-unit.source: The number of buttons to display in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 要在顯示的按鈕數目<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The default is 5.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 5。

trans-unit.source: The ButtonCount property is set to a value less than 1.
trans-unit.target: ButtonCount 屬性設定為小於 1 的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the button type to display in the pager field.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要在頁面巡覽區欄位中顯示的按鈕類型。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available button types.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用的按鈕類型。

trans-unit.source: |Button type value|Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName>|An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control.| When the ButtonType property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName>, you must provide the URL of an image for the next-page and previous page buttons.
trans-unit.target: |按鈕類型值 |描述 | |-----------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控制項。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控制項。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控制項。 | 當 ButtonType 屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName>，您必須提供下一頁和上一頁按鈕的影像 URL。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To do this, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.NextPageImageUrl%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.PreviousPageImageUrl%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要這樣做，您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.NextPageImageUrl%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.PreviousPageImageUrl%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.PreviousPageImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.NextPageImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The corresponding text property is used as the alternate text for the image.
trans-unit.target: 對應的文字屬性用於映像做為替代文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, the text that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.NextPageImageUrl%2A> property is displayed as the alternate text for the next-page image button.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，由所指定的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.NextPageImageUrl%2A>屬性會顯示為下一個頁面影像按鈕的替代文字。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.NextPageImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: On browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip for the corresponding button.
trans-unit.target: 在瀏覽器支援工具提示，也會顯示此文字對應按鈕的工具提示的方式。

trans-unit.source: The value of the ButtonType property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: ButtonType 是屬性的值儲存在檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.QueryStringField%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is not an empty string or `null`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField> object ignores the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.ButtonCount%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.QueryStringField%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性不是空字串或`null`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField>物件會忽略的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.ButtonCount%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.ButtonCount%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.QueryStringField%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In that case, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control is used to create the buttons.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>控制項用來建立按鈕。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value for the ButtonType property is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: ButtonType 屬性的值不是其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Copies the properties of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField"></xref> object to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 將目前的屬性複製<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField"></xref>到指定的物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The CopyProperties method is a helper method.
trans-unit.target: CopyProperties 方法是 helper 方法。

trans-unit.source: It is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CloneField%2A> method to copy the properties of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> object that is passed in the `newField` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 它由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CloneField%2A>方法來複製目前的內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField>物件傳入`newField`參數。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CloneField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"></xref> object to copy the properties of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField"></xref> object to.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"> </xref>要複製目前的內容物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates the user interface (UI) controls for the pager field object and adds them to the specified container.
trans-unit.target: 建立使用者介面 (UI) 控制項的頁面巡覽區欄位物件，並將它們加入至指定的容器。

trans-unit.source: The CreateDataPagers method is a helper method.
trans-unit.target: CreateDataPagers 方法是 helper 方法。

trans-unit.source: It is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.CreatePagerFields%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to create the UI controls for the pager field, such as the numeric buttons.
trans-unit.target: 它由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.CreatePagerFields%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，以建立 UI 控制項的頁面巡覽區欄位，例如數字的按鈕。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.CreatePagerFields%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The container that is used to store the controls.
trans-unit.target: 用來儲存控制項的容器。

trans-unit.source: The index of the first record on the page.
trans-unit.target: 第一個頁面上的索引。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of items on a single page.
trans-unit.target: 在單一頁面上的項目數目上限。

trans-unit.source: The total number of items.
trans-unit.target: 項目總數。

trans-unit.source: The index of the data pager field in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: 索引中的資料頁面巡覽區欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A?displayProperty=fullName>集合。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The CreateField method is a helper method.
trans-unit.target: CreateField 方法是 helper 方法。

trans-unit.source: It is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CloneField%2A> method of the base class to create an empty <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField> object.
trans-unit.target: 它由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CloneField%2A>若要建立空的基底類別方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CloneField%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cascading style sheet (CSS) class that is used to style the current page number.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來設定樣式的目前頁碼的階層式樣式表 (CSS) 類別。

trans-unit.source: Use the CurrentPageLabelCssClass property to specify the CSS class that is used to style the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> object that represents the number of the page that is currently selected.
trans-unit.target: 使用 CurrentPageLabelCssClass 屬性來指定用來樣式之 CSS 類別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>物件，代表目前選取的頁面數目。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>

trans-unit.source: The CurrentPageLabelCssClass property is always rendered as a `class` attribute, regardless of the browser.
trans-unit.target: CurrentPageLabelCssClass 屬性永遠會轉譯為`class`屬性，不論瀏覽器。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > On browsers that do not support CSS, setting the CurrentPageLabelCssClass property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 的瀏覽器不支援 CSS，設定 CurrentPageLabelCssClass 屬性有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The CSS class that is used to style the current page number in the browser.
trans-unit.target: CSS 類別，用來在瀏覽器樣式的目前頁碼。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the CurrentPageLabelCssClass property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示未設定 CurrentPageLabelCssClass 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的物件是否等於目前<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The Equals returns `true` if the two objects contain exactly the same values for all public properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField> class.
trans-unit.target: 等於傳回`true`如果兩個物件包含完全相同的值之所有的公用屬性的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField>

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前比較的物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified object is equal to the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField"></xref> object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的物件是否等於目前<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField"></xref>物件; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 做為雜湊函式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 目前的雜湊碼<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>類別。

trans-unit.source: Handles events that occur in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField"></xref> object and performs the appropriate action.
trans-unit.target: 處理中發生的事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField"></xref>物件，並執行適當的動作。

trans-unit.source: The HandleEvent method is a helper method.
trans-unit.target: HandleEvent 方法是 helper 方法。

trans-unit.source: It is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to handle events that occur in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField> object when one of the buttons inside the control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 它由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法以處理中發生的事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField>其中一個按鈕控制項內按一下時的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The HandleEvent method examines the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> object that is contained in the `e` parameter, and then performs the appropriate action.
trans-unit.target: HandleEvent 方法會檢查<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs>中所包含的物件`e`參數，然後執行適當的動作。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the buttons provided by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField> object and the action that is performed when the button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出所提供的按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField>物件和按一下按鈕時執行的動作。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField>

trans-unit.source: |Button|CommandName value|Action| |------------|-----------------------|------------| |Number|Page number|Navigates to the corresponding page of data.| |Previous page|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.PreviousPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>|Displays the previous set of page numbers and navigates to the last page of data in that set.| |Next page|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.NextPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>|Displays the previous set of page numbers and navigates to the first page of data in that set.|
trans-unit.target: |按鈕 |CommandName 值 |動作 | |------------|-----------------------|------------| |數字 |頁碼 |導覽至對應的資料頁。 | |上一頁 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.PreviousPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>|顯示先前的頁面數字集，並巡覽至最後一頁集合中的資料。 | |下一頁 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.NextPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>|顯示先前的頁面數字集，並瀏覽至該集合中的資料的第一頁。 |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.NextPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.PreviousPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of an image that is displayed for the next-page button in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定影像中的下一頁按鈕所顯示的 URL <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField"> </xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName>, use the NextPageImageUrl property to specify the URL of an image that is displayed for the next-page button.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.ButtonType%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName>，NextPageImageUrl 屬性用於指定下一頁按鈕所顯示影像的 URL。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The image can be in any file format that is supported in browser, such as .jpg, .gif, .bmp, and .png.
trans-unit.target: 映像可以處於任何支援的瀏覽器，例如.jpg、.gif、.bmp 及.png 的檔案格式。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property is set to a value other than <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName>, setting the NextPageImageUrl property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.ButtonType%2A>以外屬性設定為值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName>，設定 NextPageImageUrl 屬性有任何作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The URL of an image that is displayed for the next-page button in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 中的下一頁按鈕所顯示影像的 URL <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField"> </xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the NextPageImageUrl property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示未設定 NextPageImageUrl 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that is displayed for the next-page button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示下一頁按鈕的文字。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName>, the text specified in the NextPageText property is used as the alternate text for the image.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.ButtonType%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName>，NextPageText 屬性中指定的文字會當做替代文字使用映像。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: On browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip for the corresponding button.
trans-unit.target: 在瀏覽器支援工具提示，也會顯示此文字對應按鈕的工具提示的方式。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: It can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 它可以是使用自動儲存資源檔設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The text that is displayed for the next-page button.
trans-unit.target: 下一頁按鈕的顯示文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is "…".
trans-unit.target: 預設值是"…"。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cascading style sheet (CSS) class that is used to style the next-page and previous-page buttons of the pager field.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用於下一頁和上一頁按鈕的樣式頁面巡覽區欄位的階層式樣式表 (CSS) 類別。

trans-unit.source: The next-page and previous-page buttons are displayed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField> class to let users access other pages of data when the total number of pages is greater than the value specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.ButtonCount%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下一頁和上一頁按鈕會顯示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField>類別，讓使用者存取資料的其他頁面的頁面總數大於中指定的值時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.ButtonCount%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.ButtonCount%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField>

trans-unit.source: The NextPreviousButtonCssClass property is always rendered as a `class` attribute, regardless of the browser.
trans-unit.target: NextPreviousButtonCssClass 屬性永遠會轉譯為`class`屬性，不論瀏覽器。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > On browsers that do not support CSS, setting the NextPreviousButtonCssClass property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 的瀏覽器不支援 CSS，設定 NextPreviousButtonCssClass 屬性有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The CSS class that is used to style the next-page and previous-page buttons of the pager field.
trans-unit.target: 用於下一頁和上一頁按鈕的頁面巡覽區欄位樣式之 CSS 類別。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the NextPreviousButtonCssClass property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示未設定 NextPreviousButtonCssClass 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cascading style sheet (CSS) class that is used to style the page-number buttons of the pager field.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來設定樣式的頁面巡覽區欄位頁碼按鈕的階層式樣式表 (CSS) 類別。

trans-unit.source: Page-number buttons are displayed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField> class to enable users to navigate directly to individual pages.
trans-unit.target: 顯示頁碼按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField>類別，讓使用者直接瀏覽到個別頁面。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField>

trans-unit.source: The CSS class specified by the NumericButtonCssClass property is applied to all page numbers that are displayed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField> object, except for the page that is currently selected.
trans-unit.target: NumericButtonCssClass 屬性所指定的 CSS 類別套用至所顯示的所有頁碼<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField>物件，除了目前選取的頁面。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField>

trans-unit.source: The page currently selected page uses the CSS class that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.CurrentPageLabelCssClass%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在頁面目前選取的頁面會使用所指定的 CSS 類別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.CurrentPageLabelCssClass%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.CurrentPageLabelCssClass%2A>

trans-unit.source: The NumericButtonCssClass property is always rendered as a `class` attribute, regardless of the browser.
trans-unit.target: NumericButtonCssClass 屬性永遠會轉譯為`class`屬性，不論瀏覽器。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > On browsers that do not support CSS, setting the NumericButtonCssClass property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 的瀏覽器不支援 CSS，設定 NumericButtonCssClass 屬性有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The CSS class that is used to style the page-number buttons of the pager field.
trans-unit.target: 用來頁碼按鈕的頁面巡覽區欄位樣式之 CSS 類別。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the NumericButtonCssClass property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示未設定 NumericButtonCssClass 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of an image that is displayed for the previous-page button in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定影像中的前一頁按鈕所顯示的 URL <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField"> </xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName>, use the PreviousPageImageUrl property to specify the URL of an image that is displayed for the previous-page button.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.ButtonType%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName>，使用 PreviousPageImageUrl 屬性來指定顯示的前一頁按鈕影像的 URL。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The image can be in any file format that is supported in browsers, such as .jpg, .gif, .bmp, and .png.
trans-unit.target: 映像可以處於任何支援的瀏覽器，例如.jpg、.gif、.bmp 及.png 的檔案格式。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property is set to a value other than <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName>, setting the PreviousPageImageUrl property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.ButtonType%2A>以外屬性設定為值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName>，設定 PreviousPageImageUrl 屬性有任何作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The URL to an image that is displayed for the previous-page button in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 顯示的前一頁按鈕影像的 URL <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField"> </xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the PreviousPageImageUrl property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示未設定 PreviousPageImageUrl 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that is displayed for the previous-page button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定為前一頁按鈕顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName>, the text in the PreviousPageText property is used as the alternate text for the image.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.ButtonType%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName>，PreviousPageText 屬性中的文字會當做替代文字使用映像。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: On browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip for the corresponding button.
trans-unit.target: 在瀏覽器支援工具提示，也會顯示此文字對應按鈕的工具提示的方式。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: It can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 它可以是使用自動儲存資源檔設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The text that is displayed for the previous-page button.
trans-unit.target: 前一頁按鈕的顯示文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is "…".
trans-unit.target: 預設值是"…"。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether non-breaking spaces will be rendered between controls.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要呈現不分行空格控制項之間。

trans-unit.source: Use the RenderNonBreakingSpacesBetweenControls property to specify whether non-breaking spaces (the HTML ` ` character reference) will be rendered between the controls of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField> object, such as the page buttons.
trans-unit.target: 使用 RenderNonBreakingSpacesBetweenControls 屬性來指定是否不分行空格 (HTML` `字元參考) 將呈現的控制項之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField>物件，例如 按鈕。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField>

trans-unit.source: If you need more control over the layout that you are creating with cascading style sheet (CSS) classes, you can set RenderNonBreakingSpacesBetweenControls to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要更充分掌控您要建立具有階層式樣式表 (CSS) 類別的配置，您可以將 RenderNonBreakingSpacesBetweenControls 設`false`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if non-breaking spaces will be rendered between controls; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果之間控制項，呈現不分行空格否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。
